hypothesis_content.title: Regime Transition Breakout with Volume Profile Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes (55-70% confidence), a breakout that occurs with volume exceeding the 90th percentile of the prior 20 days AND >65% of volume occurring in the upper half of the day's range will successfully transition to BULL regime (>70% confidence) within 3 days with 85% probability.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Current 61.5% neutral confidence is ideal for regime transition plays. Volume distribution (upper half concentration) indicates institutional accumulation at breakout, not retail FOMO. This provides higher conviction than simple volume spikes.
entry_conditions: Breakout candle volume > 90th percentile of 20-day volume
>65% of volume in upper half of daily range (Volume Profile)
Close above 20-day high with >1.5% daily gain

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Regime confidence drops below 50% OR price returns below breakout level

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout volume concentrated in lower half of range OR regime remains neutral despite price breakout, indicating false move.
